name: WishCleaver Ultra
description:
A Magical Girl, Bullet Heck.

This is a game that explores the adventures of a trans magical girl. Most stuff is in development right now and I made this demo from concept to it's current state in like a weupgrade your to tek. 

This project is development so expect there to be some problems for the time being. 

If you like stuff like this then consider supporting my Patreon. These kind of projects take a lot of my time and I'd really love to continue working on them, every little bit helps

Instructions

space to shoot.

arrows and wasd to move.

c for slash i guess. (if you're lame)
